articles.description: The daughter of Douglas Latchford, who was charged with trafficking offenses shortly before his death, is returning his entire Khmer art collection to Cambodia. But questions remain over the late dealer's role in international looting networks.

articles.title: Jim Acosta: White House was lying to public about severity of Trump's illness
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump's condition after testing positive for coronavirus became so concerning in October 2020 that there was talk of putting him on a ventilator, according to what Trump told one person at the time. CNN's Jim Acosta has the details.
